evidence.claim: Klara uses AWS infrastructure for scalability and reliability.
Klara integrates with Twilio for secure communication between patients and providers.
Klara is HIPAA compliant and supports secure health data transactions.
Klara's API offers FHIR standard to facilitate healthcare data interoperability.
Klara utilizes Stripe API for payment processing, ensuring secure transactions for user payments.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionality found on site.
